texts.Key: Navigation Assistance System Message - First click asteroid
texts.Text: Captain, if you plan to visit this space station, there are a few things you should know:{Environment.NewLine}{Environment.NewLine}1. Itâ€™s essential to check the station owners' attitude toward us. Otherwise, their turrets will tear our ship to pieces.{Environment.NewLine}{Environment.NewLine}2. To dock with the station, you must be within 10 kilometers. Your speed and direction must be synchronized with the station.{Environment.NewLine}{Environment.NewLine}3. The commands for synchronizing speed and direction with the target are located on the navigation panel among the commands.
